## Turkish Airlines Stock Data

```{r}
library(quantmod)
library(dygraphs)

percen <- function(x){
  x2 <-as.numeric(x)
  out <- (x2[-1] - x2[-length(x2)])/x2[-length(x2)] * 100
  out <- as.xts(out, order.by = index(x)[-1])
}

dat <- getSymbols("mavi.IS", auto.assign = FALSE)
dat %>% Cl() %>% dygraph()
dat[, 1:4] %>% dygraph() %>% dyCandlestick()
dat %>% Cl() %>% percen %>% dygraph
```
